featured.text: Mr. Lin: Don’t you think our government should build another nuclear power plant in Taiwan?
Mr. Lin is a very ________ writer; he publishes at least five novels every year.
With a good ______ of both Chinese and English, Miss Lin was assigned the task of oral interpretation for the visiting American delegation.
The proposal Mr. Lin ______ last week has very little chance of being accepted by the committee.

definition.zh_def: 林，指樹木生長的地方或樹木的集合。
definition.en_def: A forest or a grove; an area densely populated with trees.
definition.example: The hikers walked through the serene lin, enjoying the sounds of nature.
